name: MEC Shelter Soft Shell Cycle Pants - Women's
description:
These soft shell pants are the latest in a proud line of stretchy, breathable and very water-resistant commuting solutions from MEC. They'll do the job in everything short of full-on rain and are far more comfortable than a hard shell pant in most riding conditions. Cut more like pants than tights for freedom of movement and with an abundance of reflective hits for added safety, you may find this is the only commuting pant you need.Fabric is circular knit for 4-way stretch, laminated to a non-porous hydrophobic film for water resistance.DWR treatment enhances water repellency and breathability.Comfortable elastic waist with drawcord.Articulated knees for a great fit and ease of movement.Ankle zips let you pull them on and off without taking off your shoes.Heat transfer reflective dots are bright and durable.Reflective strip and logo on each lower leg.

Regular fit, Regular rise



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
